name: Raxom
description:
Introduction
Hello everyone, my name is Reonaldo Galen Maliode
This project is for my college. Im just started on game development, so i want to challange myself by doing it alone.

Game information
This game is an classic Action based game. Can say its an old-school type game.
The game will be focused on a thing called Raxom where player will try to grasp it, but it will be not easy because there will be an obstacle.

New Update
The game now is COMPLETE!
Added Last Level!
Player Adjustment
Level Adjustment
Added Last Boss!
Added Music and Sound Effects
Hitbox Adjustment
Added controls on menu
And some little bit of background animation on menu
